body_html:
my workaround is to replace the env binary with
my workaround is to wrap the env binary and remove the dash:

#!/bin/bash

[[ "$1" == "-" ]] && shift

exec /bin/real_env $@

quite a bit ugly, but works for now. I still think, this should be reopened and investigated. Btw I have this problem on all my Gentoo systems.

body:
~~my workaround is to replace the env binary with~~
my workaround is to wrap the env binary and remove the dash:
```bash
#!/bin/bash

[[ "$1" == "-" ]] && shift

exec /bin/real_env $@
```

quite a bit ugly, but works for now. I still think, this should be reopened and investigated. Btw I have this problem on all my Gentoo systems.
